overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a strong social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total following of 3580 users. His content, which focuses on research and academic topics related to social media analysis and disinformation, consistently generates engagement, with LinkedIn being the most engaging platform.

contentThemes.description: Updates and announcements regarding new research papers, grants, and projects.
Posts about job openings and opportunities for collaborations in the field of computational social science.
Information about presenting at academic conferences and events.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts on LinkedIn to capitalize on higher engagement rates.
Utilize more visuals and infographics to enhance post visibility and interest across platforms.

platformInsights.mastodon: Moderate engagement with a focus on methodological discussions and software updates.
platformInsights.linkedin: Highest engagement, particularly with research announcements and hiring posts.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
